mng: dawn, morning, daybreak, day, dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

exm.mng: in case (sth happens), if, once (sth happens, then...), when, in a short time, in one day
Fudan University, Shanghai, abbr. for 復旦大學|复旦大学[Fu4 dan4 Da4 xue2]
role of vivacious young female in Chinese opera
in imminent peril (idiom), on the brink of crisis
